Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1986...
Released by New York (N) on 3/2/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/1986 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1988, off Danny Jackson (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1988, off Jeff Montgomery (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/22/1990 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 7/17/1991...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 7/20/1992...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: P R. Beltran, SS L. Collier, 3B J. Macias. Going to CHC: P J. Key, CF B. Jackson)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Los Angeles on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: P J. Key, CF B. Jackson. Going to CHC: P R. Beltran, SS L. Collier, 3B J. Macias)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago (N) on 3/2/1993 (Going to LA: P R. Beltran, SS L. Collier, 3B J. Macias. Going to CHC: P J. Key, CF B. Jackson)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/1/1994 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
